meanings.definition: Coming or going back to a place or person
meanings.sent1: After school, she is returning home to see her family.
meanings.sent2: The dog is returning to its owner after being lost for days.
meanings.sent3: The cat, returning to its favorite spot on the couch, knocked over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The river, returning to its natural course, carved a new path through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The sun, returning each morning, brings light and warmth to the world.

meanings.definition: Giving, sending, or taking something back
meanings.sent1: Please fill out the form for returning the library books.
meanings.sent2: She is returning the borrowed umbrella to its owner.
meanings.sent3: The returning of the lost wallet brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: The returning of the favor was unexpected but appreciated.
meanings.sent5: The returning of the stolen necklace was a relief to the owner.

meanings.definition: Yielding or producing a profit or result
meanings.sent1: The returning investment brought in a good profit.
meanings.sent2: The returning crops were a result of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The returning business venture proved to be successful beyond expectations.
meanings.sent4: The returning sales numbers indicated a positive trend for the company.
meanings.sent5: The returning customers were a testament to the quality of the product.

meanings.sent1: She smiled warmly, returning his friendly greeting.
meanings.sent2: He nodded in agreement, returning the gesture of respect.
meanings.sent3: The child, returning the hug enthusiastically, made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The audience clapped loudly, returning the performer's energy.
meanings.sent5: The team cheered loudly, returning the coach's encouragement.

meanings.definition: Changing direction or reverting to a previous state
meanings.sent1: The migrating birds are returning to their nesting grounds.
meanings.sent2: The river is returning to its original path after the floodwaters receded.
meanings.sent3: The pendulum, returning to its starting position, marked the passage of time.
meanings.sent4: The weather is returning to its usual patterns after a brief storm.
meanings.sent5: The memories are returning, flooding her mind with nostalgia.
